T206 HOF SGC for sale. Prices include shipping. PM if interested.

Lajoie Port - SGC 40- $230 
Jennings Both Hands - SGC 40 - SOLD
Griffith Port - SGC 40 - $85
McGraw Finger In Air - SGC 45 - SOLD

Dave, I received the Jennings today.  Just wanted to let other members know things went great dealing with Dave.  As a bonus the back was the factory overprint that I needed for my Sweet Cap, back run.

Thanks again, 

Bill
